UA-2.name: User Authentication
UA-2.description: Handles user registration, login, and session management with advanced security.
UA-2.verification_plan: Testing on both iOS and Android devices to ensure functionality across both platforms.

TM-2.name: Task Management
TM-2.description: Advanced task management with AI-powered prioritization and reminders.

embodiment.description: Integrates AI for enhanced task management features.

TM-2.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate task management features.

PN-2.name: Push Notifications
PN-2.description: Advanced push notifications with personalized content using Firebase Cloud Messaging.

embodiment.description: Personalized notifications based on user behavior.

PN-2.verification_plan: Testing push notifications on multiple devices to ensure delivery and accuracy.

DS-2.name: Data Synchronization
DS-2.description: Real-time data synchronization across multiple devices with low latency.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Realtime Database with Optimistic Concurrency
embodiment.description: Ensures real-time data sync with conflict resolution.

DS-2.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate data synchronization and storage.

UI-2.name: User Interface
UI-2.description: Enhanced user interface with a modern design and fluid animations.

embodiment.description: Uses animated components for a smoother user experience.

UI-2.verification_plan: Conducting usability testing with a focus group to gather feedback on the interface design.

TS-2.name: Task Sharing
TS-2.description: Advanced task sharing with permissions and access control.

embodiment.description: Fine-grained access control for shared tasks.

TS-2.verification_plan: Testing task sharing functionality across user accounts with different permissions.
